title: feat: Add LTX-2 video generation model
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: LTX-2 Video Arrives
gist.blurb: The hive is moving pictures! We've integrated LTX-2 for stunning video generation with audio support.
gist.summary: Integrated the LTX-2 video generation model via Modal, enabling 1024x1024 resolution clips with audio at $0.005/sec.
gist.impact: Creators can now generate high-quality videos with sound using the new LTX-2 model.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot acting as a film director, holding a clapperboard in a cozy pixel art movie studio setting. Represents the new video generation capabilities.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby bee mascot holding a clapperboard in a retro cinema studio. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel film reels and cameras around. Nostalgic but beautiful.
